name: randiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of feeling a lot of sexual desire: The goat has been the symbol of male randiness since classical times. See
randy
More examplesFewer examplesThese new medical interventions promise men randiness throughout their life.There is a subtle randiness that runs throughout his work.Meeting singles online doesn't have to include anything other than mutual randiness.Her randiness made her flirt outrageously with all the men.
